product_name: Granite Gear Vapor Flash Ki 52 Pack - Women's - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Returning to the roots of pack making with a clean, simple design, this lightweight pack comfortably carries multiday loads while withstanding the weather and the terrain of rugged backcountry treks.
short_description: Returning to the roots of pack making with a clean, simple design, this lightweight pack comfortably carries multiday loads while withstanding the weather and the terrain of rugged backcountry treks.
